MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the L35 postcode area of Rainhill, affecting properties in Norbury Fold. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.30pm due to a fault on the underground cable. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.18pm on March 17, 2021.
